description: My construction site in Cavalry Ground Lahore was raided during the night and building materials worth Rs. 320000 were stolen. The thieves took cement bags and electrical wiring and loaded everything quickly onto a loading rickshaw Qingqi. The site had no guard that night as the regular guard was absent. By the time the morning workers arrived everything valuable was gone. Other plots in the area have also been targeted suggesting an organized gang is operating here.
location_address: 410-D, Main Road, Cavalry Ground, close to the school, Lahore

description: I was robbed at gunpoint early morning around 6 AM outside my packaging factory gate in Gulberg II Lahore. I had just arrived with Rs. 225000 cash for weekly wages when a white Suzuki Mehran pulled up behind my car. Three masked men jumped out one pointing a pistol at me. They demanded the cash bag which I was forced to hand over immediately. They also took my mobile phone and gold chain. The whole incident lasted less than 3 minutes and they sped away towards the main road. They seemed to know exactly when and how much cash I would be carrying suggesting inside information.
location_address: Plot 86, Block H, Gulberg II, near railway crossing, Lahore

description: I am reporting theft of my bicycle imported racing bike from Johar Town Phase 2 Lahore. The vehicle was parked outside my workplace around noon when it was stolen. The registration is LEA-2864 and the vehicle is worth Rs. 190000. I had locked it properly but the lock was broken. The security guard said he did not notice anything suspicious. I suspect a gang is operating in this area as several vehicles have been stolen recently.
location_address: Plot 199, Block A, Johar Town Phase 2, close to the market, Lahore

description: I lost Rs. 205000 to an online scammer on OLX Pakistan. They were advertising an iPhone 15 Pro Max at an attractive price. After negotiating on WhatsApp I was convinced to pay in advance via Easypaisa. They promised delivery through courier within 3 days. The tracking number provided was fake and the product never arrived. The seller has disappeared and all contact numbers are unreachable. I have saved all chat history and payment receipts from my residence in Peoples Colony No. 1 Faisalabad. This was clearly a planned fraud.
location_address: House 356, Street 6, Block D, Peoples Colony No. 1, Faisalabad

description: I received a phone call around 9:30 AM from someone claiming to be from NBP bank security department. The caller spoke very professionally and said there was suspicious activity on my account that required immediate verification. Being frightened I gave them my account number and the OTP that came on my phone. Within 10 minutes Rs. 395000 was transferred out of my account in multiple transactions. When I called the real NBP helpline they confirmed it was a scam. I am a pensioner from Samanabad Faisalabad and this was my pension savings. I have call records and transaction details as evidence.
location_address: Plot 326, Block K, Samanabad, close to the market, Faisalabad

description: I was brutally assaulted around 7 PM near Fortress Stadium Lahore following a minor traffic incident. My car accidentally brushed against a black Fortuner while changing lanes. The SUV stopped abruptly in front of me blocking my path. Three well-dressed men jumped out and without any discussion started beating me. They punched and kicked me repeatedly while I was on the ground. One hit my head with an iron rod. Several people watched but nobody intervened because the attackers seemed powerful and connected. I was taken to hospital with fractured nose. I noted the number plate as evidence. This unprovoked attack has left me traumatized.
location_address: Shop 31, Fortress Stadium Commercial Area, near the main mosque, Lahore

description: I am reporting a targeted assault on me by unknown assailants near my home in Gulberg V Lahore. pre-dawn around 4 AM while I was returning home three men on a grey Suzuki Cultus stopped me and started beating me without warning. They used rods and chains. The attack lasted 2-3 minutes and they fled. I sustained severe cuts and was hospitalized. I believe this is connected to a property dispute I am involved in though I cannot be certain of who ordered the attack. I have CCTV footage from my house showing them waiting for me before the assault.
location_address: House 239-C, Street 30, Gulberg V, near railway crossing, Lahore

description: Unknown persons vandalized my shop in City Center Faisalabad during the night. They spray-painted threatening messages in Urdu on my property and broke windows causing damage worth approximately Rs. 185000. I believe this is the work of a competitor who had verbally threatened me last week after I refused to close my business. The area guard claims he was not present when this happened which seems suspicious. I have reported the earlier verbal threat to police but no action was taken. I fear for my safety and my family's well-being.
location_address: Flat 705, City Heights, City Center, Faisalabad

description: I am reporting domestic violence by my husband at our home in D-Ground Faisalabad. For the past year he has been physically abusing me regularly. Last night around 10 PM he came home in a bad mood and beat me severely causing bruises on arms and face. My children witnessed the violence and are traumatized. He has threatened to kill me if I report to anyone. I have photos of my injuries and previous hospital records. I am currently hiding at my parents house and am afraid to return.

The suspect followed me on foot and blocked my path near a dark corner. He threatened me with a concealed weapon and demanded my money. He was a tall man around 6 feet speaking in threatening tone. He took all my cash my phone and my gold ring. He ran into the nearby residential area after the robbery. The ATM camera should have recorded his face.
location_address: House 346, Street 27, Block F, MM Alam Road, Lahore

description: At around 3:30 PM near Susan Road my mobile phone was snatched by two individuals on a black Honda CD-70. I had just finished a call and was putting my phone in my pocket when the pillion rider forcefully grabbed it from my hand. The motorcycle number plate removed. description: I was robbed immediately after withdrawing cash from a Allied Bank ATM in Peoples Colony No. 1 Faisalabad around 7 PM. A man who appeared to be watching me at the ATM followed me for about 50 meters until I reached a quieter area and then confronted me. He showed me a pistol hidden under his shirt and demanded all the cash I had just withdrawn which was Rs. 110000. He also took my mobile phone and wallet. He was a short man about 5 feet 2 inches wearing ordinary casual clothes. He escaped on foot into a nearby gali. I am certain he was specifically targeting ATM users.
location_address: Plot 190, Block E, Peoples Colony No. 1, close to the school, Faisalabad

They escaped on a black motorcycle towards the bypass. A customer who had just left may have seen them arrive. I am still traumatized by the experience.
location_address: 343-J, Main Road, Shahdara, behind the restaurant, Lahore

description: I have been suffering torture at the hands of my mother-in-law and sister-in-law since my marriage at our home in Johar Town Lahore. They regularly beat me for minor things like cooking mistakes. Yesterday my mother-in-law caused burn marks because I was late in serving tea. They also demand more dowry from my parents and threaten me constantly. My husband either ignores this or sometimes joins them. I am currently at my parents house and have medical records from hospital visits.

description: I am reporting workplace harassment by my supervisor at my office in Rahwali Gujranwala. Over the past month he has made inappropriate comments about my appearance asked me to work late unnecessarily and tried to touch me inappropriately on multiple occasions. Last week he explicitly suggested that my career advancement depends on being friendly with him. When I refused he threatened to give me negative reviews and make my work life difficult. I have text messages from him on WhatsApp at inappropriate hours asking personal questions. Other female colleagues have experienced similar behavior but are afraid to report.

description: I was robbed at gunpoint evening around 5:30 PM while walking home near Valencia Town Lahore. Two men on a white Honda CG-125 stopped me and the pillion rider pointed a gun at my chest. They demanded my wallet phone and watch threatening to harm me if I resisted. I handed over approximately Rs. 75000 in cash my Realme 11 Pro worth Rs. 200000 and my wristwatch. They also took my gold chain from around my neck. They fled towards the main road at high speed. I was too terrified to get a good look at their faces but the gunman was a well-built male and young man in his early 20s.
location_address: Shop 35, Valencia Town Commercial Area, near railway crossing, Lahore

description: I was defrauded by a seller on OLX Pakistan. I found an advertisement for an Oppo Reno 10 at Rs. 60000 which was attractive pricing. The seller communicated via WhatsApp and seemed genuine with proper photos and videos of the product. He asked for full payment in advance via Easypaisa promising delivery within 2 days. After I transferred the money he sent a fake tracking number. When I checked the courier website the number did not exist. The seller blocked me on WhatsApp and all contact numbers are now switched off. I am from Faisal Town Lahore and this was money I had saved for months.
location_address: Plot 22, Block C, Faisal Town, near the main mosque, Lahore

description: I was robbed immediately after withdrawing cash from a Bank Alfalah ATM in Peoples Colony No. 2 Faisalabad evening around 5:30 PM. A man who appeared to be watching me at the ATM followed me for about 50 meters until I reached a quieter area and then confronted me. He showed me a pistol hidden under his shirt and demanded all the cash I had just withdrawn which was Rs. 60000. He also took my mobile phone and wallet. He was a thin and slim person wearing ordinary casual clothes. He escaped on foot into a nearby gali. I am certain he was specifically targeting ATM users.

The suspect followed me on foot and blocked my path near a dark corner. He threatened me with a concealed weapon and demanded my money. He was a short stocky person speaking in threatening tone. He took all my cash my phone and my gold ring. He ran into the nearby residential area after the robbery. The ATM camera should have recorded his face.

The motorcycle had without number plate. I was talking on my Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra worth Rs. 470000 when this happened. I tried to chase them but they disappeared into a narrow gali. The whole incident happened in seconds.

After I transferred the money he sent a fake tracking number. When I checked the courier website the number did not exist. The seller blocked me on WhatsApp and all contact numbers are now switched off. I am from Nishan-e-Manzil area Gujranwala and this was money I had saved for months.

When I called the real Standard Chartered helpline they confirmed it was a scam. I am a retired government officer from Rahwali Gujranwala and this was my pension savings. They asked for OTPs I received and I gave them thinking I was protecting my account. My entire savings was transferred out within minutes. I am a pensioner living in Hall Road Lahore. The phone number is now switched off.

description: I am reporting vandalism and property damage at my shop in DHA Phase 4 Lahore. Sometime during the night unknown persons damaged my property causing losses of approximately Rs. 165000. I have partial CCTV footage showing figures near my property around 2 AM but faces are not clearly visible. The damage has caused me significant financial loss and mental stress.

description: When I came out to my car this morning parked outside my house in Cavalry Ground Lahore I found that side mirrors and battery had been stolen sometime during the night. The car a Honda Civic was parked on the street as our garage was occupied. The thieves worked silently without disturbing anyone in the house. There were no signs of forced entry to the car interior so they must have used professional tools. The total loss is approximately Rs. 85000. Several other cars on our street have been similarly targeted in recent weeks. We need increased police patrolling in this area.
location_address: House 59, Street 46, Block F, Cavalry Ground, Lahore

I had approximately Rs. 310000 which was payment for the goods I had delivered. They also took my phone and watch. They escaped in a white car towards Lahore. The dhaba owner and other truckers were too scared to help as the robbers were heavily armed. This stretch of GT Road near Sheikhupura has become a robbery hotspot. Police patrolling is needed urgently at night.
location_address: Shop 42, Ferozewala Commercial Area, close to District Courts, Sheikhupura

description: I am reporting a burglary at my residence in Citi Housing Multan. The incident occurred while we were visiting Shah Rukn-e-Alam shrine for urs for the evening. The burglars broke in through the back window after cutting the CCTV wires from the boundary wall. They systematically searched every room taking only valuables. We lost gold jewelry worth 15 tola cash Rs. 305000 and several electronics. Nothing large was taken suggesting they had a vehicle waiting. Neighbors reported seeing an unfamiliar grey car in the area during the night. The burglars appeared to know our schedule as the robbery happened when the house was empty. We suspect someone familiar with our family routine may have provided information to the criminals.
location_address: Shop 97, Citi Housing Commercial Area, near Chungi No. 9, Multan

description: My motorcycle Honda 125 was stolen from outside the Jama Masjid in Ravi Town Sheikhupura during Friday prayers. I had parked my bike in the mosque parking area as usual and went inside for Jumma namaz. When I came out after about 45 minutes my bike was gone. The registration was SHK-3934 worth approximately Rs. 80000. Other people praying said they saw two young men in casual clothes near the parking but thought they were also there for prayers. The thief must have used a duplicate key as there were no signs of breaking the lock. This mosque has been targeted before I am told by other victims. I request police to patrol mosque areas on Fridays.
location_address: 490-F, Main Road, Ravi Town, near Industrial Estate gate, Sheikhupura

description: I have been suffering torture at the hands of my mother-in-law and sister-in-law since my marriage at our home in Northern Bypass Multan. They regularly beat me for minor things like cooking mistakes and demand more dowry from my parents. Yesterday my mother-in-law caused burn marks because I was late in serving guests during a family gathering. They also threatened to throw me out on the street. My husband either ignores this or sometimes joins them in the abuse. I am currently at my parents house in Shah Rukn-e-Alam Colony and have medical records from the hospital. The violence has been escalating for the past few months and I fear for my life.
location_address: House 204-, Street 27, Northern Bypass, opposite Ghanta Ghar, Multan

description: I am a worker at a surgical instruments factory in Officers Colony Sialkot and I want to report harassment by my department head. For the past month he has been sending me inappropriate WhatsApp messages and asking personal questions. He makes comments about my clothes in front of other workers which is humiliating. When I asked him to stop he threatened to give me bad performance reviews and have me fired. I come from a poor family and cannot afford to lose this job but the situation is becoming unbearable. HR department did not take my complaint seriously. I have saved all the messages as evidence. I need help as I have no other options.
location_address: Plot 342, Block G, Officers Colony, opposite DHQ Hospital, Sheikhupura

description: I was attacked by a group of 5-6 young men near Shah Rukn-e-Alam shrine parking area in Canal Colony Multan around midnight. I had visited the darbar for prayers and was returning to my vehicle when they surrounded me. They appeared intoxicated and were speaking aggressively in Seraiki. Without any provocation they started beating me with fists and wooden dandas. One of them accused me of looking at them wrong. The attack lasted about 5 minutes until some shrine visitors intervened. They fled on multiple motorcycles towards Hussain Agahi. I suffered severe bruising and was taken to Nishtar Hospital. I am a visitor from Karachi and had come for ziyarat. This was completely unprovoked violence.
location_address: House 202, Street 39, Block G, Canal Colony, Sheikhupura

description: At Model Town around noon my wallet was pickpocketed while I was shopping in the crowded bazaar near Chowk Shaheedan Multan. I was distracted looking at merchandise for my cotton trading business when someone took my wallet from my trouser pocket. The wallet contained Rs. 5000 in cash my CNIC several debit cards and my driving license. I did not feel anything and only discovered the theft when I tried to make a payment at a shop. This was clearly work of an expert pickpocket operating in the Hussain Agahi area.
location_address: 447-J, Main Road, Model Town, close to the cotton market, Multan

description: I am reporting a phone fraud. Yesterday I received a call from someone claiming to be from a bank saying I won a prize in their anniversary lucky draw. They said I needed to verify my account by paying Rs. 95000 tax which would be refunded with my prize of Rs. 300000. I am a elderly person from Gulgasht Colony Multan and believed them because they knew my name and bank. I sent the money via Easypaisa. Then they asked for more money for different charges. When I refused they threatened me and the phone went dead. I realized I was cheated. This was my pension savings and I am devastated. The number they called from is now unreachable.
location_address: Plot 361, Block J, Gulgasht Colony, near Shah Rukn-e-Alam shrine, Multan

description: My sports goods factory in Export Processing Zone Sialkot was broken into on Saturday night. The thieves entered by cutting the back wall from the adjacent vacant plot. They stole sports goods footballs gloves worth approximately Rs. 355000. The main gate was intact and the guard who stays at the front did not notice anything. By the time I arrived on Sunday morning the factory had been cleaned out of finished goods ready for export. The burglars clearly knew which products were valuable and where they were stored suggesting inside information. They used a loading rickshaw to carry away the goods based on tire marks. This is the third factory burglary on this road this month. The Export Processing Zone needs better security.
location_address: Flat 408, Al-Madina Heights, Export Processing Zone, Sialkot

description: At around midnight near Civil Lines Multan close to the shrine area I was assaulted by a gang of young men for no apparent reason. I was walking to a chai dhaba after visiting Bahauddin Zakariya darbar when they surrounded me. They appeared drunk and aggressive. Without any provocation they started hitting me with iron rods and their fists while laughing. I fell to the ground and they continued kicking me calling me an outsider. The attack stopped only when some passersby from the shrine intervened. I have cuts above eye requiring 8 stitches and was hospitalized at Nishtar. They fled on motorcycles. At least 6-7 boys were involved all appearing to be in their early 20s. The shrine area has become very unsafe at night.
location_address: 328-H, Main Road, Civil Lines, at GT Road Bypass, Sheikhupura

description: I was robbed at knifepoint around 3:30 PM near Sambrial Road Sialkot on my way back from my sports goods factory. I am a export businessman and was walking to my car parked outside the factory when a man on a black Honda CD-70 blocked my path. He showed me a large knife and demanded cash in aggressive Punjabi. I handed over Rs. 175000 from my pocket my Samsung phone and gold ring. He escaped towards Daska Road at high speed. The attack happened quickly in an isolated area behind the warehouses. Other factory owners have also been targeted in this industrial zone in the evenings. We need better security and police patrolling.
location_address: Plot 256, Block D, Sambrial Road, close to Iqbal Manzil, Sialkot

description: I am reporting a theft that occurred in Delhi Gate Multan late evening around 10 PM. My purse was stolen from my shopping bag while I was browsing at a clothing store near Hussain Agahi. The area was very crowded with people visiting the nearby shrine and someone skillfully extracted my purse without my knowledge. I had approximately Rs. 30000 cash my mobile phone and important cards in the purse. I believe the thief was a professional who took advantage of the crowd near the darbar area. I only noticed the theft when I tried to pay and found my purse missing.
location_address: Plot 333, Block F, Delhi Gate, close to the cotton market, Multan

description: I received a phone call around afternoon from someone claiming I had won Rs. 500000 in a lucky draw from a mobile company. The caller spoke very convincingly in Urdu and said I needed to pay Rs. 55000 as tax to claim my prize. Being excited I transferred the money via JazzCash as instructed. After that they asked for another Rs. 25000 for processing fee. When I became suspicious and refused they became aggressive and then stopped answering. I am a retired teacher living in Cantt Area Multan and this was money I had saved for medical expenses. I have the call records and transaction receipts. The phone number is now switched off. Please catch these fraudsters who are targeting elderly people in Multan.
location_address: 61-E, Main Road, Cantt Area, opposite Bahauddin Zakariya shrine, Multan

description: I have been suffering torture at the hands of my mother-in-law and sister-in-law since my marriage at our home in Industrial Estate Multan. They regularly beat me for minor things like cooking mistakes and demand more dowry from my parents. Yesterday my mother-in-law caused bruises on arms and face because I was late in serving guests during a family gathering. They also threatened to throw me out on the street. My husband either ignores this or sometimes joins them in the abuse. I am currently at my parents house in Shah Rukn-e-Alam Colony and have medical records from the hospital. The violence has been escalating for the past few months and I fear for my life.
location_address: Plot 129, Block A, Industrial Estate, opposite Ghanta Ghar, Multan

description: I am reporting theft from my motorcycle at the Export Processing Zone gate in Jinnah Stadium Area Sialkot. I am a worker at a leather gloves factory and had just arrived for morning shift around 7:30 AM. I left my bag on the bike for a minute while getting my ID card from pocket. When I turned back the bag with my laptop bag from bike worth Rs. 85000 was gone. There are many people coming and going at shift change time and the thief must have blended in with the crowd. A coworker said he saw a young man walking away with a bag but did not think it was suspicious. The factory gate area is not properly monitored.
location_address: Plot 14, Block , Jinnah Stadium Area, at Clock Tower, Sialkot

description: I am reporting domestic violence by my husband at our home in GT Road Commercial Multan. For the past six months I have been physically abused regularly. Last night around 10 PM my husband came home after drinking and beat me severely causing head injury. My children witnessed the violence and are traumatized. He has threatened to kill me if I report to anyone. I have photos of my injuries and previous hospital records from Nishtar Hospital. I am currently hiding at my parents house in another city and am afraid to return. I belong to a cotton trading family and my husband is unemployed which causes constant arguments. Please help me and my children.
location_address: House 121, Street 8, Block B, GT Road Commercial, Sheikhupura

description: I am reporting workplace harassment at my job in a sports goods factory in Officers Colony Sialkot. I work in the stitching section and my supervisor has been making inappropriate comments about my appearance for the past month. He asks me to stay late unnecessarily and tries to touch my hands when giving instructions. Last week he explicitly said my job security depends on being friendly with him. When I complained to the factory manager he said I was imagining things. Other women in my section have experienced similar behavior but are afraid to speak up because they need their jobs. I have text messages from the supervisor as evidence. The harassment is affecting my work and mental health.
location_address: Shop 56, Officers Colony Commercial Area, opposite Government College, Sheikhupura

description: My motorcycle Honda 125 was stolen from outside a shop in Shamsabad Multan around afternoon while I was inside for just 15 minutes buying supplies for my cotton business. I had properly locked the handle lock but the thieves must have loaded it onto a loader. The registration number was MUL-1678. Total value approximately Rs. 35000. A nearby shopkeeper mentioned seeing two suspicious young men loitering near the bikes earlier speaking in Seraiki accent. CCTV footage from neighboring shops might be available for police investigation. This area near the mandi has become notorious for vehicle theft.
location_address: House 66-J, Street 9, Shamsabad, near the mango mandi, Multan

description: I work at a sports goods factory on Daska Road in Paris Road Sialkot. When I arrived for morning shift around 8 AM I parked my motorcycle at the factory gate as usual. I went inside to clock in and when I returned 10 minutes later my wallet from bag on motorcycle was stolen. The thief must have been watching and waiting for workers to go inside. Total loss approximately Rs. 80000. Other workers have also had things stolen at this gate. The security guard was busy at the delivery entrance and saw nothing. Factory management needs to improve security at the main gate parking area. This area has become unsafe for workers.
location_address: 439-F, Main Road, Paris Road, opposite Sialkot Fort, Sialkot

description: My motorcycle Suzuki GS-150 was stolen from outside the Jama Masjid in Safdarabad Sheikhupura during Friday prayers. I had parked my bike in the mosque parking area as usual and went inside for Jumma namaz. When I came out after about 45 minutes my bike was gone. The registration was SHK-8494 worth approximately Rs. 50000. Other people praying said they saw two young men in casual clothes near the parking but thought they were also there for prayers. The thief must have used a duplicate key as there were no signs of breaking the lock. This mosque has been targeted before I am told by other victims. description: I was cheated by a property dealer who operates from an office near Allama Iqbal Chowk Sialkot. I am from Murray College Area and was looking to buy a plot in Gulshan-e-Iqbal Society. The dealer who uses the name Chaudhry Nadeem showed me documents and took me to see the plot which looked legitimate. Over two meetings I paid him Rs. 5000000 in cash. When I went to get the plot transferred in my name I discovered it was already sold to someone else years ago and the documents were forged. When I went to his office it was closed and neighbors said he had left suddenly. I have receipts of all payments with his signatures. At least 4 other families I know have been cheated by the same person. He appears to target overseas Pakistanis and first-time buyers.
location_address: 286-G, Main Road, Murray College Area, near Allama Iqbal Chowk, Sialkot

description: I was defrauded by a seller on OLX Pakistan. I am from Farooqabad Sheikhupura and found an advertisement for a Realme 11 Pro at Rs. 115000 which was attractive pricing. The seller communicated via WhatsApp and seemed genuine with proper photos and videos. He claimed to be in Lahore and asked for advance payment via JazzCash promising delivery within 2 days. After I transferred the money he sent a fake courier tracking number. When I checked it did not exist. The seller blocked me on WhatsApp and all contact numbers are now switched off. I am a farmer and this was money I had saved from last harvest.
location_address: Flat 206, Plaza Heights, Farooqabad, Sheikhupura

description: For the past 10 days I have noticed two men on a black motorcycle regularly watching near the factory residential colonies in Kot Abdul Malik Sheikhupura. They come around 4-5 PM when most families are at work and the area is quiet. They have been photographing gates and windows and asking domestic workers about family routines. They appear to be in their 30s and seem to be doing surveillance. Many neighbors have noticed them too. We believe they are planning burglaries and request police to patrol our area and investigate these suspicious individuals. The motorcycle registration starts with partial number that we have noted.
location_address: Plot 374, Block , Kot Abdul Malik, near Hiran Minar, Sheikhupura

description: I am reporting property fraud by a dealer in Paris Road Sialkot. I am an overseas Pakistani working in Saudi Arabia and came to buy a plot in Gulshan-e-Iqbal Society. A well-dressed property dealer showed me genuine looking documents and registration papers. I paid Rs. 5000000 over two visits home. The dealer promised to complete transfer before my return to Saudi. When I came back after 6 months and enquired the dealer had disappeared and the plot belongs to someone else entirely. All his phone numbers are switched off and his office on Kashmir Road is empty. I have all the fake documents and receipts as evidence. My entire life savings of 20 years abroad is gone.
location_address: House 65, Street 30, Block A, Paris Road, Sialkot

Before I could react the pillion rider scarf wrapped around face grabbed my phone and they accelerated away at high speed towards the bypass. Both appeared to be man in his 50s. The motorcycle had no number plate visible. I was using my Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra worth Rs. 50000 when this happened. I tried to chase them but they disappeared into a narrow gali near the shrine area. The whole incident happened in seconds leaving me shocked.

I gave them my wallet containing Rs. 35000 my iPhone 15 Pro Max and gold ring. The suspect was a short man about 5 feet 2 inches elderly person around 60. They spoke in Seraiki and seemed to know I had just completed a sale. They took all my cash my phone and even my watch. The whole incident lasted 3-4 minutes. After that they asked for another Rs. 25000 for processing fee. When I became suspicious and refused they became aggressive and then stopped answering. I am a pensioner living in Delhi Gate Multan and this was money I had saved for medical expenses. I have the call records and transaction receipts. The phone number is now switched off. Please catch these fraudsters who are targeting elderly people in Multan.
location_address: Shop 11, Delhi Gate Commercial Area, opposite Bahauddin Zakariya shrine, Multan

description: I have been suffering torture at the hands of my mother-in-law and sister-in-law since my marriage at our home in Railway Road Multan. They regularly beat me for minor things like cooking mistakes and demand more dowry from my parents. Yesterday my mother-in-law caused broken wrist because I was late in serving guests during a family gathering. They also threatened to throw me out on the street. My husband either ignores this or sometimes joins them in the abuse. I am currently at my parents house in Shah Rukn-e-Alam Colony and have medical records from the hospital. The violence has been escalating for the past few months and I fear for my life.
location_address: Plot 111, Block B, Railway Road, at GT Road Bypass, Sheikhupura

description: I was robbed on GT Road near Main Bazaar Sheikhupura after midnight around 1 AM while driving back from Lahore. A white Suzuki Mehran was following me for some time and then overtook and blocked my car on an isolated stretch near the bypass. Three masked men jumped out two of them carrying pistols. They spoke in Punjabi and demanded everything. I handed over Rs. 215000 cash my iPhone and gold chain. They also took my laptop bag from the back seat. The robbery lasted about 5 minutes. They warned me not to move for 15 minutes and drove away towards Muridke. I am a businessman and had sold goods in Lahore. The highway has become very dangerous at night. I have noted partial number plate of their vehicle.
location_address: House 444, Street 19, Block G, Main Bazaar, Sheikhupura

description: I am reporting a phone fraud. Yesterday I received a call from someone claiming to be from a bank saying I won a prize in their anniversary lucky draw. They said I needed to verify my account by paying Rs. 75000 tax which would be refunded with my prize of Rs. 300000. I am a senior citizen from Chowk Shaheedan Multan and believed them because they knew my name and bank. I sent the money via Easypaisa. Then they asked for more money for different charges. When I refused they threatened me and the phone went dead. I realized I was cheated. This was my pension savings and I am devastated. The number they called from is now unreachable.
location_address: Flat 303, City Heights, Chowk Shaheedan, Multan

description: I am reporting vandalism and property damage at my factory wall in GT Road Bypass Sheikhupura. Sometime during the night unknown persons damaged my property causing losses of approximately Rs. 55000. They wrote threatening messages on the walls and broke glass panels. I suspect my neighbor with whom I have an ongoing dispute about a boundary issue. He had threatened me last week. I have partial CCTV footage showing figures near my property around 2 AM but faces are not clearly visible. The damage has caused me significant financial loss and mental stress. I request police investigation.
location_address: Flat 904, Al-Madina Heights, GT Road Bypass, Sheikhupura

The dealer who uses the name Chaudhry Nadeem showed me documents and took me to see the plot which looked legitimate. Over two meetings I paid him Rs. 5000000 in cash. When I went to his office it was closed and neighbors said he had left suddenly. I have receipts of all payments with his signatures. The pillion rider wearing sunglasses quickly snatched my phone from my hand. They spoke in Seraiki and sped away towards Bosan Road direction. The rider was black jacket and both appeared to be elderly person around 60. My phone is worth approximately Rs. 485000. Several people at a nearby chai dhaba witnessed the incident. I am still shaken by the experience and request urgent police action.
location_address: 174-D, Main Road, Khanewal Road Area, behind the haveli, Multan

description: My motorcycle Honda CD-70 was stolen from outside the Jama Masjid in Officers Colony Sheikhupura during Friday prayers. I had parked my bike in the mosque parking area as usual and went inside for Jumma namaz. When I came out after about 45 minutes my bike was gone. The registration was SHK-5948 worth approximately Rs. 60000. Other people praying said they saw two young men in casual clothes near the parking but thought they were also there for prayers. The thief must have used a duplicate key as there were no signs of breaking the lock. This mosque has been targeted before I am told by other victims. I request police to patrol mosque areas on Fridays.
location_address: House 50-J, Street 49, Officers Colony, at GT Road Bypass, Sheikhupura

description: I am a 21-year-old female student at BZU and I have been stalked by an unknown man for the past three weeks near New Multan Multan. He follows me on a red Honda 125 every day from my home to university. On multiple occasions he has blocked my path near Bosan Road and made vulgar inappropriate comments in Seraiki. He appears to be man in his 50s with a thin mustache and wheatish complexion. I have photos of him and his motorcycle on my phone. He has started appearing near my hostel as well which is very frightening. I am terrified and cannot focus on my studies. My family is extremely worried about my safety. Please take action before something terrible happens.
location_address: 211-, Main Road, New Multan, near the mango mandi, Multan

description: I work at a sports goods factory on Daska Road in Model Town Sialkot. When I arrived for morning shift around 8 AM I parked my motorcycle at the factory gate as usual. I went inside to clock in and when I returned 10 minutes later my money from my pocket was stolen. The thief must have been watching and waiting for workers to go inside. Total loss approximately Rs. 40000. Other workers have also had things stolen at this gate. The security guard was busy at the delivery entrance and saw nothing. Factory management needs to improve security at the main gate parking area. This area has become unsafe for workers.
location_address: House 106, Street 4, Block H, Model Town, Sialkot

description: I am reporting property fraud by a dealer in Railway Road Sialkot. I am an overseas Pakistani working in Saudi Arabia and came to buy a house in Model Town. A well-dressed property dealer showed me genuine looking documents and registration papers. I paid Rs. 8000000 over two visits home. The dealer promised to complete transfer before my return to Saudi. When I came back after 6 months and enquired the dealer had disappeared and the plot belongs to someone else entirely. All his phone numbers are switched off and his office on Kashmir Road is empty. I have all the fake documents and receipts as evidence. My entire life savings of 20 years abroad is gone.
location_address: Shop 100, Railway Road Commercial Area, opposite Allied Hospital, Sialkot

description: I was robbed on GT Road near Lahore Motorway Interchange Area Sheikhupura after midnight around 1 AM while driving back from Lahore. A white Suzuki Mehran was following me for some time and then overtook and blocked my car on an isolated stretch near the bypass. Three masked men jumped out two of them carrying pistols. They spoke in Punjabi and demanded everything. I handed over Rs. 205000 cash my iPhone and gold chain. They also took my laptop bag from the back seat. The robbery lasted about 5 minutes. They warned me not to move for 15 minutes and drove away towards Muridke. I am a businessman and had sold goods in Lahore. The highway has become very dangerous at night. I have noted partial number plate of their vehicle.
location_address: Plot 312, Block J, Lahore Motorway Interchange Area, near Sheikhupura Fort, Sheikhupura

description: At around 11 PM near Lahore Motorway Interchange Area Multan close to the shrine area I was assaulted by a gang of young men for no apparent reason. I was walking to a chai dhaba after visiting Bahauddin Zakariya darbar when they surrounded me. They appeared drunk and aggressive. Without any provocation they started hitting me with iron rods and their fists while laughing. I fell to the ground and they continued kicking me calling me an outsider. The attack stopped only when some passersby from the shrine intervened. I have multiple fractures and was hospitalized at Nishtar. They fled on motorcycles. At least 6-7 boys were involved all appearing to be in their early 20s. The shrine area has become very unsafe at night.
location_address: 479-F, Main Road, Lahore Motorway Interchange Area, close to District Courts, Sheikhupura

description: Our house in Bosan Road Multan was burglarized on the weekend while our entire family was visiting Shah Rukn-e-Alam shrine for urs. The burglars entered by breaking the lock of the back door that opens to the haveli courtyard. They ransacked all bedrooms and broke open the jewelry box and safe. They stole gold jewelry worth approximately 4 tola Rs. 490000 cash and multiple electronics including laptops and tablets. They left large items suggesting they knew exactly what to take. Our CCTV cable was cut from outside before the break-in. A neighbor mentioned seeing a grey Suzuki Cultus parked nearby around midnight. Total loss is approximately Rs. 1290000. This was clearly a professional job targeting our family during the wedding season.
location_address: 335-F, Main Road, Bosan Road, close to BZU main gate, Multan

description: I am reporting suspicious activity in Paris Road Sialkot. For the several days unknown men have been seen loitering in the residential area particularly near houses and asking questions about residents routines. Yesterday one of them was seen taking photos of houses including mine. Neighbors are very worried as there have been burglaries in nearby areas recently. We have descriptions of the suspects and partial vehicle information. We request increased police presence and investigation before any crime occurs. The neighborhood watch group has also been alerted.
location_address: House 497, Street 4, Block E, Paris Road, Sialkot

description: I am reporting an armed robbery that occurred around 3:30 PM near the Export Processing Zone in Jinnah Stadium Area Sialkot. I am a manager dealing in surgical instruments. While walking from my factory to my car two men on a motorcycle cornered me in a narrow lane between warehouses. One showed a pistol and demanded everything. I gave them Rs. 105000 that I was carrying for supplier payments plus my phone and wallet. They spoke in threatening tone and escaped towards Wazirabad Road. This industrial area has become very unsafe in the evenings as there are few people around after closing time. I request increased police presence.
location_address: 118-E, Main Road, Jinnah Stadium Area, opposite Sialkot Fort, Sialkot

description: I have been suffering torture at the hands of my mother-in-law and sister-in-law since my marriage at our home in Bosan Road Multan. They regularly beat me for minor things like cooking mistakes and demand more dowry from my parents. Yesterday my mother-in-law caused broken wrist because I was late in serving guests during a family gathering. They also threatened to throw me out on the street. My husband either ignores this or sometimes joins them in the abuse. I am currently at my parents house in Shah Rukn-e-Alam Colony and have medical records from the hospital. The violence has been escalating for the past year and I fear for my life.

I am a elderly person from MDA Chowk Area Multan and believed them because they knew my name and bank. I sent the money via Easypaisa. Then they asked for more money for different charges. When I refused they threatened me and the phone went dead. I realized I was cheated. This was my pension savings and I am devastated. The number they called from is now unreachable.
location_address: Plot 173, Block C, MDA Chowk Area, opposite Bahauddin Zakariya shrine, Multan

description: I lost Rs. 115000 to an online scammer on Facebook Marketplace. I am from Kot Abdul Malik Sheikhupura and was looking to buy a Realme 11 Pro. The seller advertised at a good price and showed me product videos on WhatsApp video call. He asked for full payment in advance claiming he was in Faisalabad. After I sent the money via bank transfer the product never arrived. The tracking number was fake and the seller has disappeared. All phone numbers are unreachable now. I have saved all chat history and payment receipts as evidence. This was money I borrowed from relatives for the purchase.
location_address: House 405-D, Street 37, Kot Abdul Malik, opposite DHQ Hospital, Sheikhupura

description: At around 8:30 PM near Nawan Shehr my mobile phone was snatched by two individuals on a Suzuki GS-150. I had just finished a call and was putting my phone in my pocket when the pillion rider forcefully grabbed it from my hand. They spoke Seraiki and threatened me not to shout. The snatcher helmet visor down and was track suit. They fled at high speed towards Northern Bypass. My Realme 11 Pro worth Rs. 360000 is now gone along with all my contacts and data. The street was relatively empty at that hour and there were no witnesses around. This area near Multan has become very unsafe.
location_address: House 86, Street 32, Block F, Nawan Shehr, Multan

description: I am reporting theft of my motorcycle black Honda CD-70 from Nawan Shehr Multan. The vehicle was parked outside a restaurant near Ghanta Ghar when it was stolen. The registration is MUL-7851 and the vehicle is worth Rs. 65000. I had locked it properly but the lock was broken. The restaurant owner said he did not notice anything suspicious as there were many visitors to the shrine that day. I suspect a gang is operating in this old city area as several vehicles have been stolen recently from near the bazaars.
location_address: Shop 10, Nawan Shehr Commercial Area, opposite Ghanta Ghar, Multan

The wallet contained Rs. 25000 in cash my CNIC several debit cards and my driving license. I did not feel anything and only discovered the theft when I tried to make a payment at a shop. This was clearly work of an expert pickpocket operating in the Hussain Agahi area.

description: I received a phone call around afternoon from someone claiming I had won Rs. 500000 in a lucky draw from a mobile company. The caller spoke very convincingly in Urdu and said I needed to pay Rs. 45000 as tax to claim my prize. Being excited I transferred the money via JazzCash as instructed. After that they asked for another Rs. 25000 for processing fee. When I became suspicious and refused they became aggressive and then stopped answering. I am a senior citizen living in Industrial Estate Multan and this was money I had saved for medical expenses. I have the call records and transaction receipts. The phone number is now switched off. Please catch these fraudsters who are targeting elderly people in Multan.
location_address: House 32-, Street 42, Industrial Estate, close to BZU main gate, Multan

description: I am reporting domestic violence by my in-laws at our home in Delhi Gate Multan. For the past few months I have been physically abused regularly. Last night around 10 PM my husband came home after drinking and beat me severely causing head injury. My children witnessed the violence and are traumatized. He has threatened to kill me if I report to anyone. I have photos of my injuries and previous hospital records from Nishtar Hospital. I am currently hiding at my parents house in another city and am afraid to return. I belong to a cotton trading family and my husband is unemployed which causes constant arguments. Please help me and my children.

description: I am reporting an armed robbery that occurred around 11 PM near the Export Processing Zone in Gulshan-e-Iqbal Sialkot. I am a manager dealing in surgical instruments. While walking from my factory to my car two men on a motorcycle cornered me in a narrow lane between warehouses. One showed a pistol and demanded everything. I gave them Rs. 145000 that I was carrying for supplier payments plus my phone and wallet. They spoke in threatening tone and escaped towards Wazirabad Road. This industrial area has become very unsafe in the evenings as there are few people around after closing time. I request increased police presence.
location_address: Flat 104, Central Heights, Gulshan-e-Iqbal, Sialkot

description: My sports goods factory in Daska Road Industrial Sialkot was broken into on Saturday night. The thieves entered by cutting the back wall from the adjacent vacant plot. They stole finished export goods worth approximately Rs. 475000. The main gate was intact and the guard who stays at the front did not notice anything. By the time I arrived on Sunday morning the factory had been cleaned out of finished goods ready for export. The burglars clearly knew which products were valuable and where they were stored suggesting inside information. They used a loading rickshaw to carry away the goods based on tire marks. This is the third factory burglary on this road this month. The Export Processing Zone needs better security.
location_address: Plot 8, Block B, Daska Road Industrial, close to Iqbal Manzil, Sialkot

description: I am reporting a burglary at my residence in Khanewal Road Area Multan. The incident occurred while we were visiting Shah Rukn-e-Alam shrine for urs for the evening. Neighbors reported seeing an unfamiliar grey car in the area during the night. The burglars appeared to know our schedule as the robbery happened when the house was empty. The pillion rider bandana on face quickly snatched my phone from my hand. They spoke in Seraiki and sped away towards Bosan Road direction. The rider was track suit and both appeared to be person appearing 35-40 years. My phone is worth approximately Rs. 30000. Several people at a nearby chai dhaba witnessed the incident. I am still shaken by the experience and request urgent police action.
location_address: House 46, Street 14, Block G, Gulgasht Colony, Multan

description: Unknown persons vandalized my factory wall in Northern Bypass Multan during the night. They spray-painted threatening messages and broke windows causing damage worth approximately Rs. 190000. I believe this is the work of a competitor who had verbally threatened me last week after a business dispute. The area guard claims he was not present when this happened. I have reported the earlier verbal threat to police but no action was taken. I fear for my safety and my family well-being. The incident happened near the cotton market area where such incidents are becoming common.
location_address: House 34-, Street 34, Northern Bypass, near Shah Rukn-e-Alam shrine, Multan

description: At around 9:30 AM near Nawan Shehr my mobile phone was snatched by two individuals on a dark colored motorcycle. I had just finished a call and was putting my phone in my pocket when the pillion rider forcefully grabbed it from my hand. They spoke Seraiki and threatened me not to shout. The snatcher gamcha covering face and was leather jacket over shirt. They fled at high speed towards Northern Bypass. My iPhone 13 worth Rs. 85000 is now gone along with all my contacts and data. The street was relatively empty at that hour and there were no witnesses around. This area near Multan has become very unsafe.
location_address: House 255-C, Street 2, Nawan Shehr, near Nishtar Hospital, Multan

description: I am reporting a phone fraud. Yesterday I received a call from someone claiming to be from a bank saying I won a prize in their anniversary lucky draw. They said I needed to verify my account by paying Rs. 20000 tax which would be refunded with my prize of Rs. 300000. I am a pensioner from Southern Bypass Multan and believed them because they knew my name and bank. I sent the money via Easypaisa. Then they asked for more money for different charges. When I refused they threatened me and the phone went dead. I realized I was cheated. This was my pension savings and I am devastated. The number they called from is now unreachable.

description: I have been suffering torture at the hands of my mother-in-law and sister-in-law since my marriage at our home in Civil Lines Multan. They regularly beat me for minor things like cooking mistakes and demand more dowry from my parents. Yesterday my mother-in-law caused broken wrist because I was late in serving guests during a family gathering. They also threatened to throw me out on the street. My husband either ignores this or sometimes joins them in the abuse. I am currently at my parents house in Shah Rukn-e-Alam Colony and have medical records from the hospital. The violence has been escalating for the since marriage and I fear for my life.

description: I received a phone call around afternoon from someone claiming I had won Rs. 500000 in a lucky draw from a mobile company. The caller spoke very convincingly in Urdu and said I needed to pay Rs. 80000 as tax to claim my prize. Being excited I transferred the money via JazzCash as instructed. After that they asked for another Rs. 25000 for processing fee. When I became suspicious and refused they became aggressive and then stopped answering. I am a retired teacher living in Model Town Multan and this was money I had saved for medical expenses. I have the call records and transaction receipts. The phone number is now switched off. Please catch these fraudsters who are targeting elderly people in Multan.
location_address: House 260, Street 39, Block E, Model Town, Multan

description: I am reporting theft from my motorcycle at the Export Processing Zone gate in Khayaban-e-Zahra Sialkot. description: I was attacked by a group of 5-6 young men near Shah Rukn-e-Alam shrine parking area in Main Bazaar Multan around 11 PM. I had visited the darbar for prayers and was returning to my vehicle when they surrounded me. They appeared intoxicated and were speaking aggressively in Seraiki. Without any provocation they started beating me with fists and wooden dandas. One of them accused me of looking at them wrong. The attack lasted about 5 minutes until some shrine visitors intervened. They fled on multiple motorcycles towards Hussain Agahi. I suffered broken nose and was taken to Nishtar Hospital. I am a visitor from Karachi and had come for ziyarat. This was completely unprovoked violence.

I am a senior citizen from MDA Chowk Area Multan and believed them because they knew my name and bank. I sent the money via Easypaisa. Then they asked for more money for different charges. When I refused they threatened me and the phone went dead. I realized I was cheated. This was my pension savings and I am devastated. The number they called from is now unreachable.
location_address: Shop 77, MDA Chowk Area Commercial Area, near the mango mandi, Multan

description: My motorcycle Honda CD-70 was stolen from outside the Jama Masjid in GT Road Bypass Sheikhupura during Friday prayers. I had parked my bike in the mosque parking area as usual and went inside for Jumma namaz. When I came out after about 45 minutes my bike was gone. The registration was SHK-5060 worth approximately Rs. 105000. Other people praying said they saw two young men in casual clothes near the parking but thought they were also there for prayers. The thief must have used a duplicate key as there were no signs of breaking the lock. This mosque has been targeted before I am told by other victims. I request police to patrol mosque areas on Fridays.
location_address: House 215-C, Street 25, GT Road Bypass, near Industrial Estate gate, Sheikhupura

description: I am a 22-year-old female student at BZU and I have been stalked by an unknown man for the past three weeks near Suraj Miani Multan. He follows me on a red Honda 125 every day from my home to university. On multiple occasions he has blocked my path near Bosan Road and made vulgar inappropriate comments in Seraiki. He appears to be middle-aged man around 40 with a thin mustache and wheatish complexion. I have photos of him and his motorcycle on my phone. He has started appearing near my hostel as well which is very frightening. I am terrified and cannot focus on my studies. My family is extremely worried about my safety. Please take action before something terrible happens.
location_address: Flat 605, Central Heights, Suraj Miani, Multan

description: I was robbed at gunpoint around 3:30 PM while walking near Fatima Jinnah Town Multan close to the Southern Bypass. Two men on a red colored bike stopped me and the pillion rider pointed a revolver at my chest. They spoke in aggressive Seraiki and demanded my wallet phone and watch threatening to harm me if I resisted. I handed over approximately Rs. 40000 in cash my Vivo V29 worth Rs. 200000 and my wristwatch. They also took my gold chain from around my neck. They fled towards Vehari Road at high speed. I was too terrified to get a good look at their faces but the gunman was a athletic build male and person around 25-30 years old. I am a mango trader and was returning from the mandi when this happened.
location_address: House 118, Street 40, Block C, Fatima Jinnah Town, Multan

description: I am reporting workplace harassment at my job in a sports goods factory in GT Road Commercial Sialkot. I work in the stitching section and my supervisor has been making inappropriate comments about my appearance for the past two months. He asks me to stay late unnecessarily and tries to touch my hands when giving instructions. Last week he explicitly said my job security depends on being friendly with him. When I complained to the factory manager he said I was imagining things. Other women in my section have experienced similar behavior but are afraid to speak up because they need their jobs. I have text messages from the supervisor as evidence. The harassment is affecting my work and mental health.
location_address: House 155, Street 38, Block A, GT Road Commercial, Sheikhupura

description: I am reporting a burglary at my residence in Khanewal Road Area Multan. The incident occurred while we were at a family function for the evening. The burglars broke in through the back window after cutting the CCTV wires from the boundary wall. They systematically searched every room taking only valuables. They warned me not to move for 15 minutes and drove away towards Muridke. I am a businessman and had sold goods in Lahore. The highway has become very dangerous at night. I had approximately Rs. 95000 which was payment for the goods I had delivered. They also took my phone and watch. They escaped in a cream colored old Mehran towards Lahore. The dhaba owner and other truckers were too scared to help as the robbers were heavily armed. This stretch of GT Road near Sheikhupura has become a robbery hotspot. Police patrolling is needed urgently at night.
location_address: House 14-B, Street 3, Fort Road, near Hiran Minar, Sheikhupura

description: I am reporting theft from my motorcycle at the Export Processing Zone gate in Rangpura Sialkot. I am a worker at a leather gloves factory and had just arrived for morning shift around 7:30 AM. I left my bag on the bike for a minute while getting my ID card from pocket. When I turned back the bag with my laptop bag from bike worth Rs. 45000 was gone. There are many people coming and going at shift change time and the thief must have blended in with the crowd. A coworker said he saw a young man walking away with a bag but did not think it was suspicious. The factory gate area is not properly monitored.
location_address: 280-B, Main Road, Rangpura, near Export Processing Zone, Sialkot

description: I am reporting workplace harassment at my job in a sports goods factory in Railway Road Sialkot. I work in the stitching section and my supervisor has been making inappropriate comments about my appearance for the past two months. He asks me to stay late unnecessarily and tries to touch my hands when giving instructions. Last week he explicitly said my job security depends on being friendly with him. When I complained to the factory manager he said I was imagining things. Other women in my section have experienced similar behavior but are afraid to speak up because they need their jobs. I have text messages from the supervisor as evidence. The harassment is affecting my work and mental health.

location_address: 465-F, Main Road, Main Bazaar, near Industrial Estate gate, Sheikhupura

They stole gold jewelry worth approximately 2 tola Rs. 445000 cash and multiple electronics including laptops and tablets. They left large items suggesting they knew exactly what to take. Our CCTV cable was cut from outside before the break-in. A neighbor mentioned seeing a grey Suzuki Cultus parked nearby around midnight. Total loss is approximately Rs. 845000. This was clearly a professional job targeting our family during the wedding season.
location_address: Flat 708, City Heights, Canal Colony, Sheikhupura

description: I work at a sports goods factory on Daska Road in Railway Road Sialkot. When I arrived for morning shift around 8 AM I parked my motorcycle at the factory gate as usual. I went inside to clock in and when I returned 10 minutes later my money from my pocket was stolen. The thief must have been watching and waiting for workers to go inside. Total loss approximately Rs. 45000. Other workers have also had things stolen at this gate. The security guard was busy at the delivery entrance and saw nothing. Factory management needs to improve security at the main gate parking area. This area has become unsafe for workers.
location_address: 111-F, Main Road, Railway Road, opposite Sialkot Fort, Sialkot

description: I am reporting a theft that occurred in Officers Colony Multan around noon. My purse was stolen from my shopping bag while I was browsing at a clothing store near Hussain Agahi. The area was very crowded with people visiting the nearby shrine and someone skillfully extracted my purse without my knowledge. I had approximately Rs. 20000 cash my mobile phone and important cards in the purse. I believe the thief was a professional who took advantage of the crowd near the darbar area. I only noticed the theft when I tried to pay and found my purse missing.
location_address: Plot 206, Block , Officers Colony, near the mango mandi, Multan

description: I am reporting theft of my Yamaha YBR motorcycle from the main bazaar in Canal Colony Sheikhupura. I had parked outside a shop while buying supplies and was inside for only 10-15 minutes around afternoon. When I came out the bike was missing. Registration number SHK-4336 value Rs. 50000. A nearby shopkeeper said he saw a young man in his 20s casually walking to my bike and driving it away as if it was his own. He did not find it suspicious at the time. The lock was broken and left on the ground. Bike theft has become very common in Sheikhupura markets.
location_address: House 55-C, Street 15, Canal Colony, opposite DHQ Hospital, Sheikhupura

description: I am a worker at a surgical instruments factory in Sharaqpur Road Sialkot and I want to report harassment by my department head. For the past month he has been sending me inappropriate WhatsApp messages and asking personal questions. He makes comments about my clothes in front of other workers which is humiliating. When I asked him to stop he threatened to give me bad performance reviews and have me fired. I come from a poor family and cannot afford to lose this job but the situation is becoming unbearable. HR department did not take my complaint seriously. I have saved all the messages as evidence. I need help as I have no other options.
location_address: House 206-E, Street 5, Sharaqpur Road, close to District Courts, Sheikhupura

description: I am reporting an armed robbery that occurred around midnight near Askari Bypass in Multan on my way back from the cotton market. While I was walking to my vehicle a Road Prince motorcycle blocked my path. The rider showed me a black pistol and demanded everything I had in threatening Seraiki. I gave them my wallet containing Rs. 60000 my Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra and gold ring. The suspect was a lanky young man middle-aged man around 40. They escaped quickly towards Khanewal Road and I was left stranded and traumatized. There were no witnesses around to help me as it was near an isolated stretch. I immediately called police helpline after the incident.
location_address: Flat 303, Central Heights, Askari Bypass, Multan

description: I am reporting an armed robbery that occurred around 2:30 AM near Gulshan-e-Madina in Multan on my way back from the cotton market. While I was walking to my vehicle a Road Prince motorcycle blocked my path. The rider showed me a large knife about 6 inches and demanded everything I had in threatening Seraiki. I gave them my wallet containing Rs. 90000 my Xiaomi 13 and gold ring. The suspect was a heavy-set individual youth around 18-20. They escaped quickly towards Khanewal Road and I was left stranded and traumatized. There were no witnesses around to help me as it was near an isolated stretch. I immediately called police helpline after the incident.
location_address: House 435, Street 1, Block A, Gulshan-e-Madina, Multan

description: At around midnight near Haram Gate Multan close to the shrine area I was assaulted by a gang of young men for no apparent reason. I was walking to a chai dhaba after visiting Bahauddin Zakariya darbar when they surrounded me. They appeared drunk and aggressive. Without any provocation they started hitting me with iron rods and their fists while laughing. I fell to the ground and they continued kicking me calling me an outsider. The attack stopped only when some passersby from the shrine intervened. I have broken nose and was hospitalized at Nishtar. They fled on motorcycles. At least 6-7 boys were involved all appearing to be in their early 20s. The shrine area has become very unsafe at night.
location_address: Flat 504, Central Heights, Haram Gate, Multan

description: I was robbed on GT Road near GT Road Bypass Sheikhupura around 2 AM while driving back from Lahore. A white car was following me for some time and then overtook and blocked my car on an isolated stretch near the bypass. Three masked men jumped out two of them carrying pistols. They spoke in Punjabi and demanded everything. I handed over Rs. 470000 cash my iPhone and gold chain. They also took my laptop bag from the back seat. The robbery lasted about 5 minutes. They warned me not to move for 15 minutes and drove away towards Muridke. I am a businessman and had sold goods in Lahore. The highway has become very dangerous at night. I have noted partial number plate of their vehicle.
location_address: 38-E, Main Road, GT Road Bypass, near Industrial Estate gate, Sheikhupura

description: I work at a sports goods factory on Daska Road in Export Processing Zone Sialkot. When I arrived for morning shift around 8 AM I parked my motorcycle at the factory gate as usual. I went inside to clock in and when I returned 10 minutes later my phone from my bike dikki was stolen. The thief must have been watching and waiting for workers to go inside. Total loss approximately Rs. 35000. Other workers have also had things stolen at this gate. The security guard was busy at the delivery entrance and saw nothing. Factory management needs to improve security at the main gate parking area. This area has become unsafe for workers.
location_address: House 169, Street 41, Block , Export Processing Zone, Sialkot

description: I want to report stalking by an unknown man who has been following me for the past three weeks near Bosan Road in Multan. I am a 28-year-old working woman at a local bank and this person on a red Honda 125 appears on my route to work every morning near Chungi No. 9. He makes inappropriate gestures and says disgusting things in Seraiki when he comes near me. He is person around 25-30 years old and has a distinctive scar on his face. Yesterday he tried to grab my dupatta while I was waiting for transport near the university area. I am scared to leave my house now and need urgent police intervention before this escalates further.
location_address: Flat 509, City Heights, Bosan Road, Multan

description: I was robbed on GT Road near Old City Area Sheikhupura past midnight around 12:30 AM while driving back from Lahore. A white car was following me for some time and then overtook and blocked my car on an isolated stretch near the bypass. Three masked men jumped out two of them carrying pistols. They spoke in Punjabi and demanded everything. I handed over Rs. 295000 cash my iPhone and gold chain. They also took my laptop bag from the back seat. The robbery lasted about 5 minutes. They warned me not to move for 15 minutes and drove away towards Muridke. I am a businessman and had sold goods in Lahore. The highway has become very dangerous at night. I have noted partial number plate of their vehicle.
location_address: Shop 61, Old City Area Commercial Area, near Hiran Minar, Sheikhupura

description: I was attacked by a group of 5-6 young men near Shah Rukn-e-Alam shrine parking area in Khayaban-e-Zahra Multan around midnight. I had visited the darbar for prayers and was returning to my vehicle when they surrounded me. They appeared intoxicated and were speaking aggressively in Seraiki. Without any provocation they started beating me with fists and wooden dandas. One of them accused me of looking at them wrong. The attack lasted about 5 minutes until some shrine visitors intervened. They fled on multiple motorcycles towards Hussain Agahi. I suffered severe bruising and was taken to Nishtar Hospital. I am a visitor from Karachi and had come for ziyarat. This was completely unprovoked violence.
location_address: 353-F, Main Road, Khayaban-e-Zahra, near Jinnah Stadium, Sialkot

description: I was robbed at gunpoint before dawn around 5 AM near the vegetable mandi in Haram Gate Multan. I am a farmer and had just sold my produce for Rs. 355000. While walking to my tractor three men emerged from a white Suzuki Bolan that was following me. They pointed TT pistols at me and demanded all my money. They spoke in Seraiki and seemed to know I had just completed a sale. They took all my cash my phone and even my watch. The whole incident lasted 3-4 minutes. They drove away towards Vehari Road at high speed. I am devastated as this was money from my entire season's crop. Other farmers at the mandi have also been targeted I heard.
location_address: House 77-A, Street 3, Haram Gate, near the mango mandi, Multan

description: I was robbed on GT Road near Judicial Colony Sheikhupura past midnight around 12:30 AM while driving back from Lahore. A white car was following me for some time and then overtook and blocked my car on an isolated stretch near the bypass. Three masked men jumped out two of them carrying pistols. They spoke in Punjabi and demanded everything. I handed over Rs. 100000 cash my iPhone and gold chain. They also took my laptop bag from the back seat. The robbery lasted about 5 minutes. They warned me not to move for 15 minutes and drove away towards Muridke. I am a businessman and had sold goods in Lahore. The highway has become very dangerous at night. I have noted partial number plate of their vehicle.
location_address: Shop 23, Judicial Colony Commercial Area, near Hiran Minar, Sheikhupura

description: I was defrauded by a seller on Instagram. I am from Ferozewala Sheikhupura and found an advertisement for a Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra at Rs. 75000 which was attractive pricing. The seller communicated via WhatsApp and seemed genuine with proper photos and videos. He claimed to be in Lahore and asked for advance payment via JazzCash promising delivery within 2 days. After I transferred the money he sent a fake courier tracking number. When I checked it did not exist. The seller blocked me on WhatsApp and all contact numbers are now switched off. I am a farmer and this was money I had saved from last harvest.
location_address: 290-J, Main Road, Ferozewala, near Industrial Estate gate, Sheikhupura

description: I was robbed at gunpoint early morning around 5:30 AM near the vegetable mandi in Officers Colony Multan. I am a farmer and had just sold my produce for Rs. 125000. While walking to my tractor three men emerged from a white Suzuki Bolan that was following me. They pointed TT pistols at me and demanded all my money. They spoke in Seraiki and seemed to know I had just completed a sale. They took all my cash my phone and even my watch. The whole incident lasted 3-4 minutes. They drove away towards Vehari Road at high speed. I am devastated as this was money from my entire season's crop. Other farmers at the mandi have also been targeted I heard.
location_address: Shop 64, Officers Colony Commercial Area, behind the haveli, Multan

description: I was robbed at gunpoint after 1 AM while walking near Shamsabad Multan close to the Southern Bypass. Two men on a dark colored motorcycle stopped me and the pillion rider pointed a revolver at my chest. They spoke in aggressive Seraiki and demanded my wallet phone and watch threatening to harm me if I resisted. I handed over approximately Rs. 75000 in cash my iPhone 15 Pro Max worth Rs. 200000 and my wristwatch. They also took my gold chain from around my neck. They fled towards Vehari Road at high speed. I was too terrified to get a good look at their faces but the gunman was a muscular individual and person appearing 35-40 years. I am a mango trader and was returning from the mandi when this happened.
location_address: 112-J, Main Road, Shamsabad, close to the cotton market, Multan

description: My sports goods factory in Begum Kot Sialkot was broken into on Saturday night. The thieves entered by cutting the back wall from the adjacent vacant plot. They stole finished export goods worth approximately Rs. 400000. The main gate was intact and the guard who stays at the front did not notice anything. By the time I arrived on Sunday morning the factory had been cleaned out of finished goods ready for export. The burglars clearly knew which products were valuable and where they were stored suggesting inside information. They used a loading rickshaw to carry away the goods based on tire marks. This is the third factory burglary on this road this month. The Export Processing Zone needs better security.
location_address: Flat 903, City Heights, Begum Kot, Sialkot

description: I was robbed at gunpoint pre-dawn around 4 AM while walking near Fatima Jinnah Town Multan close to the Southern Bypass. Two men on a Suzuki GS-150 stopped me and the pillion rider pointed a gun at my chest. They spoke in aggressive Seraiki and demanded my wallet phone and watch threatening to harm me if I resisted. I handed over approximately Rs. 70000 in cash my iPhone 14 Pro worth Rs. 200000 and my wristwatch. They also took my gold chain from around my neck. They fled towards Vehari Road at high speed. I was too terrified to get a good look at their faces but the gunman was a well-built male and man in his 50s. I am a mango trader and was returning from the mandi when this happened.
location_address: Shop 13, Fatima Jinnah Town Commercial Area, opposite Bahauddin Zakariya shrine, Multan

description: I am reporting a phone fraud. Yesterday I received a call from someone claiming to be from a bank saying I won a prize in their anniversary lucky draw. They said I needed to verify my account by paying Rs. 15000 tax which would be refunded with my prize of Rs. 300000. I am a pensioner from Fatima Jinnah Town Multan and believed them because they knew my name and bank. I sent the money via Easypaisa. Then they asked for more money for different charges. When I refused they threatened me and the phone went dead. I realized I was cheated. This was my pension savings and I am devastated. The number they called from is now unreachable.
location_address: House 326-, Street 8, Fatima Jinnah Town, near the mango mandi, Multan

description: I have been suffering torture at the hands of my mother-in-law and sister-in-law since my marriage at our home in DHA Multan Multan. They regularly beat me for minor things like cooking mistakes and demand more dowry from my parents. Yesterday my mother-in-law caused cuts requiring stitches because I was late in serving guests during a family gathering. They also threatened to throw me out on the street. My husband either ignores this or sometimes joins them in the abuse. I am currently at my parents house in Shah Rukn-e-Alam Colony and have medical records from the hospital. The violence has been escalating for the past year and I fear for my life.
location_address: Plot 82, Block J, DHA Multan, opposite Bahauddin Zakariya shrine, Multan

description: I was attacked by a group of 5-6 young men near Shah Rukn-e-Alam shrine parking area in Cantt Area Multan around 8:30 PM. I had visited the darbar for prayers and was returning to my vehicle when they surrounded me. They appeared intoxicated and were speaking aggressively in Seraiki. Without any provocation they started beating me with fists and wooden dandas. One of them accused me of looking at them wrong. The attack lasted about 5 minutes until some shrine visitors intervened. They fled on multiple motorcycles towards Hussain Agahi. I suffered fractured arm and was taken to Nishtar Hospital. I am a visitor from Karachi and had come for ziyarat. This was completely unprovoked violence.
location_address: Flat 201, City Heights, Cantt Area, Sialkot

description: My smartphone was snatched early morning around 6 AM while I was walking near Gulshan-e-Madina in Multan. Two suspects on a white motorcycle approached slowly from behind. Before I could react the pillion rider cap pulled low over eyes grabbed my phone and they accelerated away at high speed towards the bypass. Both appeared to be youth around 18-20. The motorcycle had no number plate visible. I was using my Oppo Reno 10 worth Rs. 225000 when this happened. I tried to chase them but they disappeared into a narrow gali near the shrine area. The whole incident happened in seconds leaving me shocked.
location_address: 212-K, Main Road, Gulshan-e-Madina, near the mango mandi, Multan

description: I am reporting an armed robbery that occurred on GT Road near Cantt Area Sheikhupura late at night around 11:30 PM. I am a truck driver and had stopped at a dhaba for chai when three armed men approached. They pointed guns at my head and demanded the cash I was carrying for the trip. I had approximately Rs. 65000 which was payment for the goods I had delivered. They also took my phone and watch. They escaped in a white car towards Lahore. The dhaba owner and other truckers were too scared to help as the robbers were heavily armed. This stretch of GT Road near Sheikhupura has become a robbery hotspot. Police patrolling is needed urgently at night.
location_address: Shop 58, Cantt Area Commercial Area, near Industrial Estate gate, Sheikhupura

description: At around 2:30 AM near Wapda Town my mobile phone was snatched by two individuals on a blue Yamaha YBR. I had just finished a call and was putting my phone in my pocket when the pillion rider forcefully grabbed it from my hand. They spoke Seraiki and threatened me not to shout. The snatcher no face covering and was grey hoodie. They fled at high speed towards Northern Bypass. My Xiaomi 13 worth Rs. 120000 is now gone along with all my contacts and data. The street was relatively empty at that hour and there were no witnesses around. This area near Multan has become very unsafe.
location_address: 490-J, Main Road, Wapda Town, behind the haveli, Multan
